**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 38 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 33 [Lomok](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1830) **Source** [Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra](/Sources.aspx?ID=116) pg. 57 **Perception** +21; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23) **Languages** [Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +23, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +19, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +21, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +19, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +21 **Str** +5 **Dex** +3 **Con** +3 **Int** +0 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +2 **Items** [Full Plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13), _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31)_, [spears](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10) (3), [_lesser sturdy shield_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=327) ((Hardness 10, HP 80, BT 40)) --- **AC** 30 (32 with shield raised) **Fort** +20 **Ref** +18 **Will** +23 +1 status to all saves vs. [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) **HP** 210 **Aura of Courage** 15 feet. Whenever Lomok becomes [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19), reduce the condition value by 1 (minimum 0). At the end of his turn, when he would reduce his frightened condition value by 1, also reduce the value by 1 for all allies in his aura.
**Powerful Will** When Lomok rolls a success on a Will save, he gets a critical success instead.
**[Retributive Strike](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=31)** **Trigger** An enemy damages one of Lomok's allies, and both combatants are within 15 feet of him; **Effect** Lomok shields his ally and calls for retribution upon the attacker. The ally reduces the triggering damage by 13. Lomok and any allies within reach of the triggering enemy can make melee Strikes against it.
**[Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=32)**
**Spurred by Death** **Trigger** An ally within 30 feet reduces a creature to 0 HP; **Effect** Lomok Steps, Strides, or Strikes. --- **Speed** 20 feet **Melee** _longsword_ +24 ([versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 2d8+11 slashing plus 1d10 [persistent fire](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) **Ranged** spear +22 ([thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 1d6+11 piercing **Divine Innate Spells** DC 28 - **Cantrips (6th)** [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171) - **1st** [Bless](/Spells.aspx?ID=25) **Champion Devotion Spells** DC 28, 2 Focus Points - **6th** [Lay on Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=395) **Oath of the Burning Mammoths** Lomok's melee Strikes deal an additional 1d10 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). If he critically hits a creature with a melee Strike, the creature is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) for as long as it takes persistent fire damage.
name: Lomok
